question: Recently, the Parliament passed Jammu and Kashmir Official Languages Bill, 2020. Which among the following languages are included in the list of official languages in the Union Territory of Jammu and Kashmir?
explanation: The Parliament of India passes the Jammu and Kashmir Official Languages Bill, 2020 which take into account the inclusion of Kashmiri, Dogri and Hindi in the list of official languages in the Union Territory of Jammu and Kashmir, in addition to the existing Urdu and English.
